locations.name: Dorm Room
locations.brief_description: Your cozy dorm room, a small space filled with personal belongings and study materials.
locations.long_description: You are in your dorm room, a compact yet comfortable space that serves as your personal sanctuary. The walls are adorned with posters of your favorite bands and motivational quotes. A neatly made bed occupies one corner, while a cluttered desk covered with textbooks, notebooks, and a dead laptop sits under the window. The soft hum of the mini-fridge adds a soothing background noise. This is where you plan your day, study for exams, and occasionally escape into the world of your favorite novels.

locations.name: Courtyard
locations.brief_description: A spacious courtyard surrounded by campus buildings, bustling with students amidst vibrant flower beds and towering oak trees.
locations.long_description: You step into the courtyard, a spacious open area surrounded by the various buildings of the campus. The ground is paved with cobblestones, and well-tended flower beds add splashes of color to the scenery. Students are scattered around, some engaged in lively conversations on benches, while others are engrossed in their studies under the shade of mature oak trees. The air is filled with the subtle scent of blooming flowers and freshly cut grass. To the north, you see the entrance to the dorm room; to the east lies the library; the class building is to the south; and to the west, you notice the pathway leading to the CS lounge. A gentle breeze rustles the leaves, creating a serene atmosphere that invites you to explore further or simply take a moment to relax.

throw out scrap paper: After throwing out your scrap paper, you discover some cash laying in the trash can

locations.name: Library
locations.brief_description: A quiet library filled with rows of bookshelves, study tables, and the faint rustle of pages turning.
locations.long_description: You enter the library, a haven of knowledge and tranquility. Tall bookshelves stretch from floor to ceiling, laden with volumes spanning every subject imaginable. The soft glow of reading lamps illuminates cozy study tables, where students are immersed in their work. The air carries the subtle scent of aged paper and ink. To the west, the exit leads back to the courtyard; to the east, a passageway connects to the cafeteria. A sense of calm envelops you, inviting exploration of the vast resources housed within these walls.

locations.name: Cafeteria
locations.brief_description: A bustling cafeteria filled with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee and a variety of culinary delights.
locations.long_description: You step into the cafeteria, where the lively chatter of students and the clinking of utensils create a vibrant atmosphere. The enticing aroma of freshly brewed coffee and an array of culinary offerings fill the air. To the west, a passage leads back to the library.

locations.name: Classroom 2
locations.brief_description: A quiet classroom with rows of empty desks and a large whiteboard at the front.
locations.long_description: You enter Classroom 2, where rows of empty desks are neatly arranged, awaiting the next lecture. A senior is sitting in the back. To the west, a door leads back to the Class Building.

locations.name: Classroom 1
locations.brief_description: A classroom equipped with various electronic devices and study materials.
locations.long_description: You enter Classroom 1, where desks are arranged in neat rows, each accompanied by a chair. The room is equipped with various electronic devices and study materials, creating an environment conducive to learning. To the east, a hallway leads back to the Class Building.

locations.name: Prof Office
locations.brief_description: A quiet and formal office with shelves filled with academic papers. The professor is available for your help.
locations.long_description: You enter the professor’s office, a serene and professional space filled with the scent of old books and coffee. The room is neatly arranged, with a large wooden desk covered in papers, textbooks, and academic journals. The professor, known for their sharp intellect and discipline, sits at the desk, ready to offer guidance. Bookshelves line the walls, crammed with research materials and a few personal items. Certificates and awards hang proudly, showcasing the professor’s accomplishments. It’s a place of focus and learning, where academic challenges are met with thoughtful solutions. To the North, is the Class Building

locations.name: CS Lounge
locations.brief_description: A relaxed and social space where computer science students gather to unwind, study, and chat.
locations.long_description: You step into the CS Lounge, a cozy and lively area where computer science students gather to take a break or study together. The room is filled with soft couches and bean bags, scattered with laptops and books. A large whiteboard is on one side, covered with code and algorithms, while students are engrossed in conversations or typing away on their computers. The walls are decorated with tech posters and inspirational quotes. To the east, an open spaced courtyard is present

locations.name: Class Building
locations.brief_description: A busy academic building filled with classrooms, professor offices, and hallways buzzing with students.
locations.long_description: You find yourself in the Class Building, a central hub of activity on campus. The hallways are lined with classrooms, some filled with students preparing for lectures, others quiet and awaiting the next session. The air is filled with the sound of footsteps echoing off the walls as students rush between classes. The walls are decorated with academic posters and flyers for campus events. To the North, you enter the courtyard. To the east, you enter the classroom 2. To the west, you enter the classroom 1. To the south, you enter the Professors office
